Minichamps 430798552 Ford Capri Turbo 1978 DRM Series Div.II 7th Place H. Heyer

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: https://minichamps.de/EN/Models/ModelDetails/430798552/index.html

Other than the wiper mentioned in my previous post, the fact that the livery is all decals is another clue to the age of the models. I have to say they have held up very, very well!

From fordmotorsportmodels.com: The spectacular Ford Capri Turbo was unveiled at Hockenheim GP Germany July 29, 1978 - nearly two-thirds of the way through the DRM championship season. The Livery was the black and the red/yellow colours of Zakspeed's main sponsors Mampe (Mampe is a bitter-orange German liqueur). Prior to this the team was racing Ford Escorts. With only one day's testing, Heyer took pole position by 4 seconds from the championship leading BMW 320 of Harald Ertl. In the race the car was leading but only completed 5 laps, retiring with engine trouble opposite the Zakspeed/Ford hospitality box. In the remainder of the season Heyer took 3 poles and a first victory for the Capri at the Nurburgring in October.
